title: Harry S Truman National Historic Site: Bookstore
body: Bookstore       Your Buck Stops Here! The Harry S Truman National Historic Site bookstore and gift shop is located in the park visitor center located at 223 N. Main.  The shop is operated by our cooperating association, Eastern National, which contributes a portion of its sales back into the park for visitor-related projects. By purchasing items in our bookstore, you are helping to support the park!  At Harry S Truman NHS, visitors can purchase books, souvenirs, and educational items to enhance their visit to the Truman site, learn about world events during the Truman administration and increase their knowledge of the National Park Service. Please visit the Harry S Truman NHS online bookstore or visit eparks.com. To learn more about Eastern National, click here.  Â     NPS Photo
